Source: Reuters

Description: BMO Capital Markets' managing director of equity research, Simeon Siegel, asked "why Apple wasn't thrown into the mix" of companies reportedly interested in buying Peloton, as the iPhone maker already sells hardware and premium products, unlike Amazon.com and Nike Inc.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3GCt5d4
